Package org.magnos.io.buffer

Interface Summary
BufferFactory A factory for allocating and freeing ByteBuffers.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBufferFactory An abstract implementation of a BufferFactory.
BufferFactoryBinary A BufferFactory where all cached buffers have a power-of-2 size within a range, defined by powers.
BufferFactoryDirect A BufferFactory which does not cache and uses DirectByteBuffers.
BufferFactoryFixed A BufferFactory where the buffers allocated all have the same size.
BufferFactoryHeap A BufferFactory which does not cache and uses HeapByteBuffers.
BufferFactoryMap Works best when application only requests a known subset of buffer sizes opposed to a crazy combination of sizes.
ByteBufferStack A lock-free thread-safe stack of ByteBuffers.
